Package view.elements

Class ElementView<T extends IGraphElement>

java.lang.Object
view.elements.ElementView<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrowView, ChargeView, PotentiometerView
public abstract class ElementView<T extends IGraphElement> extends Object
Subclasses of ElementView allow a given IGraphElementType to be displayed on a Graph. References: 1. Contributors to Wikimedia projects. “Model–View–Controller.” Wikipedia, Wikimedia Foundation, Inc., 2003, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Model-view-controller. 2. Peterlic, Ana. “Type Parameter vs Wildcard in Java Generics.” Baeldung, 28 Dec. 2022, https://www.baeldung.com/java-generics-type-parameter-vs-wildcard.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Charlie Herbert

  • Constructor Details

    • ElementView

      public ElementView(Graph2D graph, int sortOrder)
      Creates a new element view with an initialized sort order.
      Parameters:
      graph - The graph to associate this view with.
      sortOrder - The sorting order of this view object.

  • Method Details

    • getSortOrder

      public int getSortOrder()
      Gets this view's sort order. Used to determine how elements should be drawn. A higher value means that this view will be drawn on top of the others.
      Returns:
      the numerical value of this view's sort order.

    • getDrawableType

      public abstract Class<? extends IGraphElement> getDrawableType()
      Gets the subclasses of IGraphElement that can be drawn by this view
      Returns:
      The class object of the type that can be drawn by this view.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D graphics)
      Draws all elements of this view's graph field that match getDrawableType using the provided graphics.
      Parameters:
      graphics - The graphics to use when drawing each element.

    • getInteractablesAtPoint

      public ArrayList<IGraphElement> getInteractablesAtPoint(double x, double y)
      Gets all potential interactables managed by this view at a point.
      Parameters:
      x - the x position to consider.
      y - the y position to consider.
      Returns:
      A list of IGraphElements that have bounds containing the passed point.
